Monthly Group Meditation (Sathsang)
 

Dear {{FIRST_NAME}},

Isha Monthly Group Meditation is an opportunity to reconnect with your kriya with Sadhguru's voice guiding you through the Shambhavi Mahamudra Kriya. Here are the details of our upcoming Sathsang:
Perth - Sat, 12 Nov 2016, 5pm - 7:15pm
Corinthian Park Hall, Cnr Beatrice Ave & Leach Hwy, Shelley, WA, 6148
Sydney - Sat, 12 Nov, 5pm - 7:15pm
Wesley Conference Hall, Gloster Udy Room, 175 Hawkesbury Rd, Westmead
Melbourne - Sun, 13 Nov, 5pm - 7:15pm
Multicultural Hub, 506 Elizabeth St, Melbourne
Brisbane - Sat, 12 Nov, 5pm - 7:15pm
Slacks Creek Progress Hall, 151 - 153 Barbaralla Drive, Springwood

Please ensure that

  • you are on empty stomach
  • you are seated in the hall at least 15 minutes before the start time as late comers will not be permitted.

Inner engineering online participants
Please be outside the door not later than 35 minutes of start time to join the session after the Shambhavi practice.

* Please note that Sathsang will be conducted on the 2nd Saturday of every month across centres in Australia.

Programme Schedule
